Name: Anime Jigsaw Puzzles
About the game: Anime Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Anime Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for anime fans. - 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces! - 80 Anime puzzles - Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time! - Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time. - 1080p HD Graphics. - Support multiple screen sizes.
